functions.tag: {EquipmentType:"rangeWeapon",Rarity:"leg",Manufacturer:"traditional",Effect:"str2_dar2_hun2",display:{Name:"\"§6Absolue Tenacité\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Endure, fier comme le ciel, tenace comme le temps,\"}","{\"text\":\"§7jusqu'à l'horizon inaccessible de persévérance.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Endures, proud as the sky, tenacious as time,\"}","{\"text\":\"§7to the unattainable horizon of perseverance.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a2 §7DAR§a2 §7HUN§a2\"}"]},Damage:0,Enchantments:[{id:"minecraft:unbreaking",lvl:7s}],AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName:generic.attack_speed,Name:generic.attack_speed,Amount:-0.7,Operation:1,Slot:mainhand,UUID:[I;0,50002,0,50001]}],BlockEntityTag:{Base:15,Patterns:[{Color:5,Pattern:"dls"},{Color:5,Pattern:"bl"},{Color:13,Pattern:"br"},{Color:13,Pattern:"tl"},{Color:5,Pattern:"tr"},{Color:13,Pattern:"drs"}]}}

{EquipmentType:"armor",Rarity:"epi_set",Manufacturer:"harmonious",Effect:"res1_dar2_has_2_spd_1",SetId:"8",display:{Name:"\"§5Volonté de fer\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§aL'élu de ce monde, à qui obéissent temps et\"}","{\"text\":\"§aespace, ne connaît aucune limite à sa volonté.\"}","{\"text\":\"§aThe chosen one of this world, to whom\"}","{\"text\":\"§atime and space obey, knows no limit to his will.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7RES§a1 §7DAR§a2 §7HAS§c-2 §7SPD§c-1\"}"]},Damage:150,Enchantments:[{id:"minecraft:protection",lvl:1s}],AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName:generic.armor,Name:generic.armor,Amount:6,Operation:0,Slot:legs,UUID:[I;0,10003,0,20000]},{AttributeName:generic.armor_toughness,Name:generic.armor_toughness,Amount:2.4,Operation:1,Slot:legs,UUID:[I;0,20003,0,20000]},{AttributeName:generic.max_health,Name:generic.max_health,Amount:1.0,Operation:0,Slot:legs,UUID:[I;0,30003,0,20000]},{AttributeName:generic.knockback_resistance,Name:generic.knockback_resistance,Amount:0.01,Operation:0,Slot:legs,UUID:[I;0,30003,0,20000]}]}

{EquipmentType:"armor",Rarity:"leg",Manufacturer:"teran",Effect:"spd4_dar3",display:{Name:"\"§6Course éperdue\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Sauvez-vous, fuyez, envolez-vous,\"}","{\"text\":\"§7égarez-moi, dans la cachette du rêveur\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Get away, run away, fly away,\"}","{\"text\":\"§7lead me astray, to dreamer's hideaway\"}","{\"text\":\"§7SPD§a4 §7DAR§a3\"}"],color:12470537},Damage:0,Enchantments:[{id:"minecraft:unbreaking",lvl:50s},{id:"minecraft:protection",lvl:3s},{id:"minecraft:mending",lvl:1s}],AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName:generic.armor,Name:generic.armor,Amount:9.79,Operation:0,Slot:legs,UUID:[I;0,10003,0,20000]},{AttributeName:generic.armor_toughness,Name:generic.armor_toughness,Amount:2.81,Operation:1,Slot:legs,UUID:[I;0,20003,0,20000]},{AttributeName:generic.knockback_resistance,Name:generic.knockback_resistance,Amount:0.02,Operation:0,Slot:legs,UUID:[I;0,30003,0,20000]}]}
